sentences.en: ‘Do you let your kids travel alone at night?’ ‘Absolutely not!’
sentences.cn: “你会让孩子们晚上单独外出吗？”“当然不行！”

sentences.en: ‘They could have told us, couldn't they? ’ ‘Absolutely! ’
sentences.cn: “他们本来可以告诉我们的，不是吗？”“当然！”

sentences.en: "I absolutely hated school," Rachel says. "I skived off all the time."
sentences.cn: “我恨透了学校，”雷切尔说，“我总是逃学。”

sentences.en: "I'm absolutely thrilled to have done what I've done," he declared.
sentences.cn: 他宣称道：“我为自己的所作所为感到兴奋不已。”

sentences.en: Are you absolutely sure?
sentences.cn: 你绝对肯定吗？

sentences.en: By the end of the evening they were all absolutely paralytic.
sentences.cn: 晚上结束时，他们全都酩酊大醉。

sentences.en: He made his reasons for resigning absolutely clear.
sentences.cn: 他把辞职的理由讲得一清二楚。

sentences.en: He's walking into a situation that he absolutely can't control.
sentences.cn: 他正陷入自己完全无法控制的局面。

sentences.en: I am absolutely furious that he divorced me to marry her.
sentences.cn: 他为了娶她而和我离婚，我愤怒至极。

sentences.en: I don't mind telling you I was absolutely terrified.
sentences.cn: 说真的，我当时吓坏了。

sentences.en: I felt absolutely certain that I'd seen her before.
sentences.cn: 我完全确信自己以前曾见过她。

sentences.en: I knew absolutely nothing about handling or feeding a baby.
sentences.cn: 我对如何抱婴儿、如何给婴儿喂食一无所知。

sentences.en: It was absolutely the worst food I have ever had.
sentences.cn: 这绝对是我吃过的最糟糕的食物。

sentences.en: Kozelek expresses his sense of desolation absolutely without self-pity.
sentences.cn: 科泽莱克不带一丝顾影自怜地表达了自己的凄凉悲怆之感。

sentences.en: My own view is absolutely clear. What I did was right.
sentences.cn: 我自己的观点非常清楚。我做的事是正确的。

sentences.en: She's absolutely certain she's going to make it in the world.
sentences.cn: 她坚信自己会出人头地。

sentences.en: The car park was absolutely packed solid with people.
sentences.cn: 停车场被人挤得水泄不通。

sentences.en: There are thousands of students absolutely gagging to come to this university.
sentences.cn: 肯定有成千上万的学生都渴望到这所大学念书。

sentences.en: This cake is absolutely delicious.
sentences.cn: 这蛋糕好吃极了。

sentences.en: You are absolutely correct. The leaves are from a bay tree.
sentences.cn: 你说得很对，这是月桂树的叶子。

trans.tran_cn: 完全地，彻底地，（用于强调）确实地，绝对地
